title: Custom Didone-ish font, but based on what?
content:
What's the name of this delicate Didone? That's what they're called, no?  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416000351im_/https:/s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/01/94/da/0194da8081d1344eb709f1d2f833900e.jpg)
author: dead.sound

comments.content:
"WEST END" must be **[Adobe Garamond Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416000351/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Adobe%20Garamond%20Titling%20Capitals%20-%20Regular&fid=164bbb4e031e5267f7b71946eee8958e&fsize=60&text=WEST%20END&wrap=2)**

while "avenue" is **[Adobe Garamond (Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416000351/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Adobe%20Garamond%20Pro%20-%20Italic&fid=b2a0974b474f9f4b9306729d697e9ad0&fsize=60&text=avenue&wrap=2)**

2 previous discussions on this topic: [http://typophile.com/node/121579](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416000351/http:/typophile.com/node/121579 "http://typophile.com/node/121579") and [http://typophile.com/node/120289](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416000351/http:/typophile.com/node/120289 "http://typophile.com/node/120289")
